data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates

data.caption: Clarification - Financial Results
data.news_body: The Exchange has sought clarification from Bohra Industries Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company is required to clarify the following:  The response of the Company is awaited.

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication for financial Results for the half year ended 30th September 2025

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Intimation for Rectification'.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Extraordinary General Meeting held on October 08, 2025. Further, the company has submitted the Exchange a copy of Scrutinizers report and voting Results.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding outcome of Extra-Ordinary General Meeting held on October 08, 2025.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Annual General Meeting held on September 30, 2025. Further, the company has submitted the Exchange a copy of Scrutinizers' report voting results

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'regularization of director, appointment of secretarial auditor in 29th Annual General Meeting.'.

data.caption: Corrigendum
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Corrigendum to Notice of Annual General Meeting to be held on September 30, 2025

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Errata in respect of Annual Report of Financial year 2024-25 filed on 8th September, 2025

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Bohra Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015
